platform_used: Zoom - I have access to the necessary functionality to record the session.
Zoom. The University of Leeds has a Zoom account available to use and we felt that more people would be familiar with Zoom than Google Meet.
Google Meet because that's the software we use in-house, and we are also a Google partner
Zoom, for ease of use
MS Teams
n/a
Zoom webinar, felt more professional
Zoom - most used app for easy access for all
Zoom - as we have full access through our organisation and it does not limit access of external attendees
Zoom as it's easily accessible
Zoom, it's our standard event hosting platform.
GoToWebinar - already have license, easy to use
Zoom for the features it had to allow QnA and polls.
Zoom - most convenient and accessible for our audience
Zoom - because it's familiar to many people and easy to use for the webinar purposes
Zoom, ease of integration with Eventbrite and breakout room function
Airmeet, we have found it to be the easiest and most accessible platform for the type of event we organised
Zoom
Livestorm
Microsoft Teams - this was our preferred supplier for security with online events
Zoom
Hosted 4 events all on Zoom - easiest tool to use for webinars
Google Meet - this is the same platform used by our company.
We used Zoom Webinar as this is what we use internally so we know how it works - wanted to keep it as simple as possible so less chances of things going wrong!
